validations.message: Must be able to create a user assigned identity in the resource group
Must be able to create role assignments
Must be able to create an Azure Kubernetes Service (aks) cluster in the resource group
Must be able to create a virtual network in the resource group
Must be able to create storage accounts in the resource group
Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, the first character must be a letter and must be between 3 and 10 characters in length.

basics.name: privateDeployment
basics.label: Private endpoint access
basics.toolTip: Will create private endpoints in local virtual network where possible

basics.name: hostEncryption
basics.label: Use host encryption for virtual machines / nodes
basics.toolTip: Host encryption feature must be enabled in the subscription to use. Applies to both managed VM and aks cluster nodes.

elements.name: deployBastion

elements.toolTip: Check this box if you want to determine whether to deploy a bastion service to access the environment

elements.toolTip: Select sku for bastion service.

elements.toolTip: Check this box if you want to disable ability to copy and paste to bastion session

elements.toolTip: Check this box if you want to disable ability to copy and paste to bastion session

elements.label: Bastion Enable Kerberos
elements.toolTip: Check this box if you want to enable the kerberos feature of the bastion service

elements.name: bastionEnableShareableLink
elements.label: Bastion Enable Shareable Link
elements.toolTip: Check this box if you want to enable the Shareable link feature of the bastion service

elements.name: bastionEnableTunneling
elements.label: Bastion Enable Tunneling
elements.toolTip: Check this box if you want to enable the Shareable link feature of the bastion service

toolTip.virtualNetwork: Selecting an existing VNet or enter the name of a new one

endpointSubnet.label: End point Subnet (Required if private components)

bastionSubnet.label: Bastion Subnet (Required if deploying bastion service)

vmSubnet.label: Management VM Subnet (Required if deploying a management VM)

elements.name: deployManagementVm
elements.label: Deploy Management VM
elements.toolTip: Check this box if you want to deploy management VM for the cluster

elements.name: vmAdminUserName
elements.label: VM Admin User Name
elements.toolTip: Administrator username to be created

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 5-30 characters long. Reserved usernames are not allowed.

toolTip.sshPublicKey: SSH public key to be used for access to the administrator user

constraints.customValidationMessage: The password must be alphanumeric, contain at least 12 characters, and have at least 1 letter and 1 number.

elements.name: vmSize
elements.label: VM Size
elements.toolTip: The size of the management VM

elements.name: vmDiskType
elements.label: VM Disk Type
elements.toolTip: The type of disk for the management VM

elements.name: vmZone
elements.label: VM Zone
elements.toolTip: Azure availability zone for management VM

elements.name: vmCreatePublicIP
elements.label: VM Create Public IP
elements.toolTip: Check this box if you want public ip to be created

elements.name: vmPublicIPName
elements.label: VM Public IP Name
elements.toolTip: Check this box if you want public ip to be created

elements.name: vmDomainName
elements.label: VM Domain Name
elements.toolTip: Enter a domain name to give the public IP address. Must be unique.

validations.message: Domain name must be between 4 and 32 characters long. Lowercase alphanumeric (first character must be a letter), dashes and underscores only.

options.text: [concat('The VM public IP will be available at ',steps('managementVM').vmDomainName,'.',location(),'.cloudapp.azure.com')]

elements.name: ibmEntitlementKey
elements.toolTip: Enter your provided IBM entitlement API key for software image download from icr.io

constraints.validationMessage: Entitlement Key must be at least  characters long, contain only numbers and letters
Password must be atleast 8 characters long, contain only numbers and letters

elements.name: sipTag

elements.name: provideJwtKey

elements.name: jwtKey

options.text: If using an existing JWT public key, it must conform to the format required.
